bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a tan 痰③ , phlegm, disease with blockage resulting from phlegm abundance and no qi depletion. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry qian hu 前胡：主療痰滿，胸脅中 痞，心腹結氣，風頭痛，去痰實，下氣 , “It controls phlegm fullness, an obstacle-illness in the chest and flanks, bound qi nodes in the heart and abdomen, and wind headache. It removes phlegm repletion and causes qi to descend”.
